title: Careless Whisper
lyrics:
But (Bb)now who's gonna dance with (A)me?
(C)Please stay!
 
[chorus]
(Dm) I'm never gonna dance again
(Gm)Guilty feet have got no rhythm
(Bb) Though it's easy to pretend
I (A)know you're not a (C)fool
I (Dm)should've known better than to cheat a friend
And (Gm)waste the chance that I'd been given
(Bb) So I'm never gonna dance again
The (A)way I danced with (C)you
 
[kazoo] | (Dm) | (Gm) | (Bb) | (A)  (C) | (Now that youâ€™re gone!)  x2
(Dm-single strum) [end]
